page.title: 05BLACK PARK
page.content: BLACK PARK IS A VERY SMALL VILLAGE MADE UP MAINLY OF COUNCIL HOUSES.THERE ARE 76 HOUSES. THERE IS ONE CHAPEL, ONE SHOP, ONE INSTITUTE,ONE FARM AND ONE PHONE BOX. THERE ARE QUITE ALOT OF OLD PEOPLE IN BLACK PARK. MOST OF THE PEOPLE IN BLACK PARK HAVE LIVED THERE ALL THIER LIVES.BUT THE YOUNG PEOPLE DO NOT STAY BECAUSE IT IS TOO QUITE AND THEY WANT ENYOYMENT AND WORK. EVERYONE HAS TO TRAVEL TO GO TO WORK USUALLY ABOUT 10 MILES.THERE IS ONE MAN WHO WORKS AT BERSHAM COLLIERY WREXHAM HE LEAVES FOR WORK AT 6.30AM AND COMES HOME AT 9.30PM ON A COACH. THERE ARE THREE STREETS IN BLACK PARK, THE FIRST STREET IS NOT MODERNISED BUT THE SECOND AND THIRD STREETS ARE.THE OLDEST PERSON IS 85.
